snippet.title: Our Lovely Escape - Trailer
snippet.description:
NOW ON KICKSTARTER - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1367486473/our-lovely-escape-bishoujo-visual-novel?ref=creator_nav

Your life is a peaceful one. Each day, you work alongside your (otherwise?) all-female workforce in the pursuit of creating otome games.

Will you complete your life with a cute girlfriend? Will you be doomed to a life of normalcy? Or...?

Download the demo on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/970400/Our_Lovely_Escape/

--
Music by Red Robotix
Trailer by KotoriWorks
